greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of (883 + 42*sqrt(2))/881.
comment: Equals lim_{n -> infinity} b(n)/b(n-1) for n mod 3 = {1, 2}, b = A130014.
Equals lim_{n -> infinity} b(n)/b(n-1) for n mod 3 = {0, 2}, b = A159690.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
xref: Cf. A130014, A159690, A002193 (decimal expansion of sqrt(2)), A159692 (decimal expansion of (2052963+1343918*sqrt(2))/881^2).
results.author: _Klaus Brockhaus_, Apr 21 2009
